scripts.build:dev: cmd-cv -r html -o www & node-sass scss -o www/static/css & webpack --mode=development
scripts.build:prod: cmd-cv -r html -o www & node-sass scss -o www/static/css & webpack --mode=production
scripts.watch: cmd-cv -r html -o www -w & node-sass -w scss -o www/static/css & webpack --watch --mode=development; fg
